title: Beth Orton makes an uncompromising record that is completely hers
description: Getting dropped from your record label isn't a good thing, per se, but for Beth Orton, it gave her the opportunity to take the reins.
itunes:title: Beth Orton makes an uncompromising record that is completely hers
itunes:author: Stephen Kallao
itunes:summary: Getting dropped from your record label isn't a good thing, per se, but for Beth Orton, it gave her the opportunity to take the reins.
